item.description:
Karen B. is hosting this event

It's the last Thursday of music by the harbor at both the Institute of Contemporary Art and Boston Harbor Hotel! Join us at the back deck of the ICA to hear very talented Berklee College of Music musicians perform. (Great people-watching, too!) Afterwards we will walk over to the Blues Barge at the Boston Harbor Hotel for some dancing (or at least listening) to some excellent blues!

Let's enjoy the remaining evenings of a beautiful summer! Karen will be standing by the gate entering the deck in the back of the ICA (located in front of the bleachers).

Please note, there is a small bar and light fare at the ICA, which is accessible by the Silver line and has parking lot ($15 charge).

Links to both series below:

http://www.icaboston.org/programs/performance/music/harborwalk_sounds2012/yesberger_band/?event_id=23811120

http://www.bhh.com/pdf/summer%20series_SM6.pdf
item.name: Live Music at the ICA and Boston Harbor Hotel
